title: Was LoL down for over an hour?
body:
Stuck in a 20+ min queue, logged out, couldn't log back in (said I needed to follow a guide) and then boards wouldn't load. And none of this is mentioned anywhere?

Damn, I missed out on at least 2 ranked solo games. Now only flex is up {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

What error were you receiving when attempting to connect to the boards?

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
